name: sgpyoga-website
description: SGP Yoga website with multilingual support

scripts.build: npm run build:i18n && npm run build:blog
scripts.watch:i18n: node build-i18n.js && echo 'Watching for changes... (Ctrl+C to stop)' && fswatch -o index.html about.html classes.html events.html locales/ | xargs -n1 -I{} node build-i18n.js

author: SGP Yoga
